price: Dijo Noé: "¡Señor mío! He exhortado a mi pueblo noche y día,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
